org.apache.storm.topology

Interface IRichBolt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBolt, IComponent, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEsBolt, AbstractHBaseBolt, AbstractHdfsBolt, AbstractJdbcBolt, AbstractMongoBolt, AbstractRedisBolt, AvroGenericRecordBolt, BaseCassandraBolt, BaseRichBolt, BaseStatefulBoltExecutor, BaseTickTupleAwareRichBolt, BasicBoltExecutor, BatchBoltExecutor, BatchCassandraWriterBolt, BlobStoreAPIWordCountTopology.SplitSentence, BoltTracker, CassandraWriterBolt, CheckpointTupleForwarder, ClojureBolt, CoordinatedBolt, DevNullBolt, DruidBeamBolt, EsIndexBolt, EsLookupBolt, EsPercolateBolt, EventHubBolt, ExclamationTopology.ExclamationBolt, FluxShellBolt, GenericBolt, HBaseBolt, HBaseLookupBolt, HdfsBolt, HdfsFileTopology.MyBolt, HdfsSpoutTopology.ConstBolt, HiveBolt, IdBolt, IdentityBolt, JdbcInsertBolt, JdbcLookupBolt, JmsBolt, JoinResult, KafkaBolt, KeyedFairBolt, LookupWordCount.PrintWordTotalCountBolt, MongoInsertBolt, MongoUpdateBolt, MqttBolt, MultipleLoggerTopology.ExclamationLoggingBolt, OpenTsdbBolt, PMMLPredictorBolt, PythonShellMetricsBolt, RedisFilterBolt, RedisLookupBolt, RedisStoreBolt, ResourceAwareExampleTopology.ExclamationBolt, ReturnResults, RichShellBolt, RollingCountAggBolt, RollingCountBolt, SequenceFileBolt, SequenceFileTopology.MyBolt, SingleJoinBolt, SolrUpdateBolt, StatefulBoltExecutor, StatefulWindowedBoltExecutor, TestAggregatesCounter, TestEventOrderCheckBolt, TestGlobalCount, TestPlannerBolt, TransactionalSpoutBatchExecutor, TridentBoltExecutor, TupleCaptureBolt, WhitelistWordCount.PrintWordTotalCountBolt, WindowedBoltExecutor, WordCountTopology.SplitSentence, WordCountTopologyNode.SplitSentence

    public interface IRichBolt
extends IBolt, IComponent

    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.storm.task.IBolt

        cleanup, execute, prepare

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent

        declareOutputFields, getComponentConfiguration
